roleset.name: invalidate, reverse
roleset.note: OVERTURN-V NOTES: Frames file for 'overturn' based on sentences in wsj and automaticexpansion via verbnet. (from overturn.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: pretty simple, really
example.text: In September, a New York appellate court overturned a state judge's ruling that awarded the Cup to the New Zealand team.
example.arg: a state judge's ruling that awarded the Cup to the New Zealand team
